trans-unit.source: Represents a base class for design-time tools, not derived from <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner" />, that provide smart tag or designer verb capabilities.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma classe base para as ferramentas de tempo de design, não derivadas de <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner" />, que fornecem funcionalidades de verbo do designer ou de marcações inteligente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> class provides the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> properties to query for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> collections, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner> classe fornece a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.ActionLists%2A> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Verbs%2A> propriedades para consultar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb> coleções, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: However, if a design-time tool author decides not to derive from this class, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> class represents an alternative base class to provide this functionality.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se um tempo de design ferramenta autor decide não derivar dessa classe, o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> classe representa uma classe base alternativa para fornecer essa funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> class contains only three members, described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> classe contém apenas três membros, descritos na tabela a seguir.

trans-unit.source: Public member
trans-unit.target: Membro público

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Descrição

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of either the smart tags or designer verbs associated with the designed component.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de marcas inteligentes ou de verbos do designer associados ao componente projetado.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a implementação base `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all the smart tags associated with the designed component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de todas as marcações inteligentes associadas ao componente projetado.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation simply calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base simplesmente chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all the designer verbs associated with the designed component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de todos os verbos de designer associados ao componente projetado.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation simply calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base simplesmente chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> should be added as a site-specific service.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet> deve ser adicionado como um serviço específico do site.

trans-unit.source: Externally, a service of this type should first be queried to discover smart tag and designer verb functionality.
trans-unit.target: Externamente, um serviço desse tipo deve ser consultado primeiro para descobrir marca inteligente e funcionalidade de verbo do designer.

trans-unit.source: If this service is not found, then the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: Se esse serviço não for encontrado, então o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner.Verbs%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade deve ser usada em vez disso.

trans-unit.source: This procedure provides a path for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Esse procedimento fornece um caminho para versões anteriores compatibilidade.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet" />.

trans-unit.source: Because this base class contains no state, the default constructor does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Como essa classe de base contém sem estado, o construtor padrão não fará nada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all the smart tags associated with the designed component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de todas as marcações inteligentes associadas ao componente projetado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> that contains the smart tags for the associated designed component.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> que contém as marcas inteligentes para o componente projetado associado.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation simply calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A> with the string parameter "ActionLists".
trans-unit.target: A implementação base simplesmente chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A> com o parâmetro de cadeia de caracteres "ActionLists".

trans-unit.source: The type of collection to return, indicating either a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> or a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de coleção a retornar, indicando um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> ou um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of command objects.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de objetos de comando.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains the specified type—either <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> or <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" />—of command objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém o tipo especificado – <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> ou <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerb" /> – de objetos de comando.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation always returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base sempre retorna <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Although the base implementation always returns `null`, the overridden version supplied by the programmer should return a collection of command objects of the type described by `name`.
trans-unit.target: Embora a implementação base sempre retorna `null`, a versão substituída fornecida pelo programador deve retornar uma coleção de objetos de comando do tipo descrito pelo `name`.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.Verbs%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.ActionLists%2A> properties specify the following values and meanings for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: A implementação base do <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.Verbs%2A> e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.ActionLists%2A> propriedades especificam os valores e os seguintes significados para esse parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: String
trans-unit.target: Cadeia de Caracteres

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: Significado

trans-unit.source: "ActionLists"
trans-unit.target: "ActionLists"

trans-unit.source: Return a collection of all the smart tags associated with the component.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de todas as marcas inteligentes associadas ao componente.

trans-unit.source: "Verbs"
trans-unit.target: "Verbos"

trans-unit.source: Return a collection of all the designer verbs associated with the component.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção de todos os verbos do designer associado ao componente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all the designer verbs associated with the designed component.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de todos os verbos de designer associados ao componente projetado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> that contains the designer verbs for the associated designed component.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerVerbCollection" /> que contém os verbos do designer para o componente projetado associado.

trans-unit.source: The base implementation simply calls <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A> with the string parameter "Verbs".
trans-unit.target: A implementação base simplesmente chama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerCommandSet.GetCommands%2A> com o parâmetro de cadeia de caracteres "Verbos".
